title: WATCH: This video of Mona Lisa and Vikrant rehearsing for Nach Baliye will make you go aww! : What's hot, News - India Today
text:
â€” Monalisa (@MonalisaAntara) February 20, 2017 Mona and Vikrant have been working together ever since the couple got married on Bigg Boss. In fact, the first film Mona shot after the reality TV show was opposite the hubby dear--titled Jai Shree Ram. The couple have also been doing stage shows together. And now they have got another opportunity to spend some time together.
Also read: This is what Mona Lisa is up to after Bigg Boss 10 
In an interview with India Today Online, a few weeks back, Mona had revealed that she and Vikrant had been wanting to go on a holiday, but the work commitments keep them busy. 
We really hope they go on their honeymoon soon. But in the meanwhile, gear up to watch them on Nach Baliye. For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
